definition: to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Determines the resistance of lubricating grease to flow under prescribed conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在規定條件下測量潤滑油脂的抗移動性。

sentences.english: Why might you need the mobility feature?
sentences.chinese: 爲何可能需要這個移動性特性？

sentences.english: Shifting dullness and a fluid wave are more difficult to elicit and require more ascites.
sentences.chinese: 移動性濁音和流體波更難引出而且需要更大量的腹水。

sentences.english: A mobile population needs rentable homes.
sentences.chinese: 一個移動性人口需要的就是能夠租得起的房子。

sentences.english: M-cube is highly mobile, adaptable and is lightweight as well.
sentences.chinese: M型立方體移動性，適用性都很強勁，並且十分輕便。

sentences.english: Mobility as the killer enterprise app.
sentences.chinese: 移動性是殺手級企業應用。

sentences.english: WATER & MOBILITY, Two new arc-shaped roads provide connections between downtown and the Trinity River.
sentences.chinese: 河流與移動性，兩條拱形道路連接了城市與河流。

sentences.english: We're especially seeing it show up in the changing mobility of our enterprise offerings.
sentences.chinese: 這一點在企業應用的移動性的發展上表現得尤爲明顯。

sentences.english: Finally, the research trend of mobility management in all-IP networks is outlined.
sentences.chinese: 指出了全IP網絡中移動性管理的研究方向。

sentences.english: The bee has a huge mobility advantage, but the spider is craftier .
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂有着巨大的移動性優勢，但跳蛛更加狡猾。
插肩袖，提供更好的移動性。

definition: (jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
(of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)
lit. pull one hair and the whole body moves/fig. a slight change will affect everything else/the butterfly effect
pinyin: qian1 yi1 fa4 er2 dong4 quan2 shen1
